title: Strengthening CS Competencies in Practical Skills: Managing Symptom Burden in Hemodialysis Patients: Machine Learning-Based Prediction Models

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and machine learning concepts, with experience in medical data analysis
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can classify symptom burden assessment criteria for hemodialysis patients based on data-driven approaches
Learners can implement symptom severity prediction models using feature selection techniques (Boruta) and classification models (XGBoost)
Learners can explain the clinical interpretability of model predictions through SHAP value analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
